description: A target group is a collection of targets, or compute resources, that run your application or service. A target group can only be used by a single service.

Enabled.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Protocol.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HTTP | HTTPS  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HTTP1 | HTTP2  
Update requires: No interruption

Port.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: (^/[a-zA-Z0-9@:%_+.~#?&/=-]*$|(^$))  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!tg-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement
